commands.roll: Generates a random number from 0 to 6 if no arguments are supplied. If two are supplied, then the number's range is from <arg1> to <arg2>
commands.list: Lists all available registered text commands
commands.stop: Stops the bot. Only sunkenpotato has the permission to do this
commands.song: Generates a random song using Spotify's API
commands.rname: Generates a random string of text with the length of <arg1>
commands.purge-t: Purges the last <arg1> messages. If 'all' is supplied, the bot deletes all messages in the channel
